00019 /*---- USB registers -----------------------------------------------*/
00020 
00021 // USB Core Registers
00022 #define  BASE     0x00
00023 #define  FADDR    BASE
00024 #define  POWER    BASE + 0x01
00025 #define  IN1INT   BASE + 0x02
00026 #define  OUT1INT  BASE + 0x04
00027 #define  CMINT    BASE + 0x06
00028 #define  IN1IE    BASE + 0x07
00029 #define  OUT1IE   BASE + 0x09
00030 #define  CMIE     BASE + 0x0B
00031 #define  FRAMEL   BASE + 0x0C
00032 #define  FRAMEH   BASE + 0x0D
00033 #define  INDEX    BASE + 0x0E
00034 #define  CLKREC   BASE + 0x0F
00035 #define  E0CSR    BASE + 0x11
00036 #define  EINCSRL  BASE + 0x11
00037 #define  EINCSRH  BASE + 0x12
00038 #define  EOUTCSRL BASE + 0x14
00039 #define  EOUTCSRH BASE + 0x15
00040 #define  E0CNT    BASE + 0x16
00041 #define  EOUTCNTL BASE + 0x16
00042 #define  EOUTCNTH BASE + 0x17
00043 #define  FIFO_EP0 BASE + 0x20
00044 #define  FIF0_EP1 BASE + 0x21
00045 #define  FIF0_EP2 BASE + 0x22
00046 #define  FIFO_EP3 BASE + 0x23
00047 
00048 // USB Core Register Bits
00049 
00050 // POWER
00051 #define  rbISOUD        0x80
00052 #define  rbSPEED        0x40
00053 #define  rbUSBRST       0x08
00054 #define  rbRESUME       0x04
00055 #define  rbSUSMD        0x02
00056 #define  rbSUSEN        0x01
00057 
00058 // IN1INT
00059 #define  rbIN3          0x08
00060 #define  rbIN2          0x04
00061 #define  rbIN1          0x02
00062 #define  rbEP0          0x01
00063 
00064 // OUT1INT
00065 #define  rbOUT3         0x08
00066 #define  rbOUT2         0x04
00067 #define  rbOUT1         0x02
00068 
00069 // CMINT
00070 #define  rbSOF          0x08
00071 #define  rbRSTINT       0x04
00072 #define  rbRSUINT       0x02
00073 #define  rbSUSINT       0x01
00074 
00075 // IN1IE
00076 #define  rbIN3E         0x08
00077 #define  rbIN2E         0x04
00078 #define  rbIN1E         0x02
00079 #define  rbEP0E         0x01
00080 
00081 // OUT1IE
00082 #define  rbOUT3E        0x08
00083 #define  rbOUT2E        0x04
00084 #define  rbOUT1E        0x02
00085 
00086 // CMIE
00087 #define  rbSOFE         0x08
00088 #define  rbRSTINTE      0x04
00089 #define  rbRSUINTE      0x02
00090 #define  rbSUSINTE      0x01
00091 
00092 // E0CSR
00093 #define  rbSSUEND       0x80
00094 #define  rbSOPRDY       0x40
00095 #define  rbSDSTL        0x20
00096 #define  rbSUEND        0x10
00097 #define  rbDATAEND      0x08
00098 #define  rbSTSTL        0x04
00099 #define  rbINPRDY       0x02
00100 #define  rbOPRDY        0x01
00101 
00102 // EINCSR1
00103 #define  rbInCLRDT      0x40
00104 #define  rbInSTSTL      0x20
00105 #define  rbInSDSTL      0x10
00106 #define  rbInFLUSH      0x08
00107 #define  rbInUNDRUN     0x04
00108 #define  rbInFIFONE     0x02
00109 #define  rbInINPRDY     0x01
00110 
00111 // EINCSR2
00112 #define  rbInDBIEN      0x80
00113 #define  rbInISO        0x40
00114 #define  rbInDIRSEL     0x20
00115 #define  rbInFCDT       0x08
00116 #define  rbInSPLIT      0x04
00117 
00118 // EOUTCSR1
00119 #define  rbOutCLRDT     0x80
00120 #define  rbOutSTSTL     0x40
00121 #define  rbOutSDSTL     0x20
00122 #define  rbOutFLUSH     0x10
00123 #define  rbOutDATERR    0x08
00124 #define  rbOutOVRUN     0x04
00125 #define  rbOutFIFOFUL   0x02
00126 #define  rbOutOPRDY     0x01
00127 
00128 // EOUTCSR2
00129 #define  rbOutDBOEN     0x80
00130 #define  rbOutISO       0x40
00131 
00132 // USB device speed settings
00133 #define  FULL_SPEED     0x20
00134 #define  LOW_SPEED      0x00
00135 
00136 // USB clock selections (SFR CLKSEL)
00137 #define  USB_4X_CLOCK   0x00
00138 
00139 // System clock selections (SFR CLKSEL)
00140 #define  SYS_INT_OSC    0x00
00141 #define  SYS_EXT_OSC    0x01
00142 
00143 // Define endpoint status values
00144 #define  EP_IDLE           0
00145 #define  EP_TX             1
00146 #define  EP_ERROR          2
00147 #define  EP_HALTED         3
00148 #define  EP_RX             4
00149 
00150 // Define device states
00151 #define  DEV_DEFAULT       0
00152 #define  DEV_ADDRESS       1
00153 #define  DEV_CONFIG        2
00154 
00155 #define  EP_MASK_DIR    0x80
00156 
00157 // Endpoint addresses
00158 #define  EP1_IN         0x81
00159 #define  EP1_OUT        0x01
00160 #define  EP2_IN         0x82
00161 #define  EP2_OUT        0x02
00162 #define  EP3_IN         0x83
00163 #define  EP3_OUT        0x03
00164 
00165 /* Register read/write macros */
00166 #define UREAD_BYTE(addr,target) USB0ADR = (0x80 | addr); while(USB0ADR & 0x80); target = USB0DAT
00167 #define UWRITE_BYTE(addr,data) USB0ADR = addr; USB0DAT = data; while(USB0ADR & 0x80)
00168 
00169 /*---- Basic types -------------------------------------------------*/
00170 
00171 typedef unsigned char BYTE;
00172 typedef unsigned int UINT;
00173 typedef union {unsigned int i; unsigned char c[2];} WORD;
00174 
00175 /*---- USB configuration -------------------------------------------*/
00176 
00177 #define  NUM_CFG 1                         // Total number of defined
00178                                            // configurations
00179 
00180 #define  MAX_IF_DSC 1                      // Maximum number of interface
00181                                            // descriptors for any defined
00182                                            // configuration
00183 
00184 #define  MAX_IF 1                          // Maximum number of interfaces
00185                                            // for any defined configuration
00186 
00187 #define  CFG1_IF_DSC 1                     // Total number of interface
00188                                            // descriptors for configuration1
00189 
00190 #define  CFG1_EP_DSC 2                     // Total number of endpoint
00191                                            // descriptors for configuration1
00192 
00193 #define  REMOTE_WAKEUP_SUPPORT 0           // This should be "ON" if the
00194                                            // device is capable of remote
00195                                            // wakeup (this does not mean that
00196                                            // remote wakeup is enabled)
00197                                            // Otherwise "OFF"
00198 
00199 #define  SELF_POWERED_SUPPORT 0            // This should be "ON" if the
00200                                            // device is self-powered;
00201                                            // "OFF" if the device
00202                                            // is bus-powered.
00203 
00204 #define  SUSPEND_ENABLE 0                  // This should be "ON" if the
00205                                            // device should respond to suspend
00206                                            // signaling on the bus.
00207                                            // Otherwise "OFF"
00208 
00209 #define  ISO_UPDATE_ENABLE 0               // This should be "ON" if the ISO
00210                                            // Update feature should be turned
00211                                            // on for all ISO endpoints. It
00212                                            // should be "OFF" if the ISO
00213                                            // update feature should not be
00214                                            // enabled, or if no ISO endpoints
00215                                            // will be configured
00216 
00217 // Endpoint buffer / packet sizes
00218 // These constants should match the desired maximum packet size for each
00219 // endpoint. Note that the size must not exceed the size of the FIFO
00220 // allocated to the target endpoint. This size will depend on the configuration
00221 // of the endpoint FIFO (split mode and double buffer options), as described
00222 // in the device datasheet.
00223 #define  EP0_PACKET_SIZE   64              // Endpoint0 maximum packet size
00224 #define  EP1_PACKET_SIZE   64              // Endpoint1 maximum packet size
00225 #define  EP2_PACKET_SIZE   64              // Endpoint2 maximum packet size
00226 
00227 /*---- Structures --------------------------------------------------*/
00228 
00229 /* Endpoint status (used for IN, OUT, and Endpoint0) */
00230 typedef struct EP_STATUS {
00231    BYTE  bEp;                 // Endpoint number (address)
00232    UINT  uNumBytes;           // Number of bytes available to transmit
00233    UINT  uMaxP;               // Maximum packet size
00234    BYTE  bEpState;            // Endpoint state
00235    void *pData;               // Pointer to data to transmit
00236    WORD  wData;               // Storage for small data packets
00237 } EP_STATUS;
00238 typedef EP_STATUS * PEP_STATUS;
00239 
00240 /* Interface status */
00241 typedef struct IF_STATUS {
00242    BYTE bNumAlts;             // Number of alternate choices for this
00243                               // interface
00244    BYTE bCurrentAlt;          // Current alternate setting for this interface
00245                               // zero means this interface does not exist
00246                               // or the device is not configured
00247    BYTE bIfNumber;            // Interface number for this interface
00248                               // descriptor
00249 } IF_STATUS;
00250 typedef IF_STATUS * PIF_STATUS;
00251 
00252 /* Device status */
00253 typedef struct DEVICE_STATUS {
00254    BYTE bCurrentConfig;       // Index number for the selected config
00255    BYTE bDevState;            // Current device state
00256    BYTE bRemoteWakeupSupport; // Does this device support remote wakeup?
00257    BYTE bRemoteWakeupStatus;  // Device remote wakeup enabled/disabled
00258    BYTE bSelfPoweredStatus;   // Device self- or bus-powered
00259    BYTE bNumInterf;           // Number of interfaces for this configuration
00260    BYTE bTotalInterfDsc;      // Total number of interface descriptors for
00261                               // this configuration (includes alt.
00262                               // descriptors)
00263    BYTE* pConfig;             // Points to selected configuration desc
00264    IF_STATUS IfStatus[MAX_IF];// Array of interface status structures
00265 } DEVICE_STATUS;
00266 typedef DEVICE_STATUS * PDEVICE_STATUS;
00267 
00268 /* Control endpoint command (from host) */
00269 typedef struct EP0_COMMAND {
00270    BYTE  bmRequestType;       // Request type
00271    BYTE  bRequest;            // Specific request
00272    WORD  wValue;              // Misc field
00273    WORD  wIndex;              // Misc index
00274    WORD  wLength;             // Length of the data segment for this request
00275 } EP0_COMMAND;

00277 /*---- Descriptor related ------------------------------------------*/
00278 
00279 // Descriptor sizes
00280 #define  STD_DSC_SIZE     18               // Device
00281 #define  CFG_DSC_SIZE      9               // Configuration
00282 #define  IF_DSC_SIZE       9               // Interface
00283 #define  EP_DSC_SIZE       7               // Endpoint
00284 
00285 // Standard Device Descriptor Array Indicies
00286 #define  std_bLength 0                     // Length of this descriptor
00287 #define  std_bDescriptorType 1             // Device desc type (const. 0x01)
00288 #define  std_bcdUSB 2                      // USB Specification used (BCD)
00289 #define  std_bDeviceClass 4                // Device Class
00290 #define  std_bDeviceSubClass 5             // Device SubClass
00291 #define  std_bDeviceProtocol 6             // Device Protocol
00292 #define  std_bMaxPacketSize0 7             // Maximum packet size for Endpoint0
00293 #define  std_idVendor 8                    // Vendor ID 
00294 #define  std_idProduct 10                  // Product ID
00295 #define  std_bcdDevice 12                  // Device revision number
00296 #define  std_iManufacturer 14              // Manufacturer name string index
00297 #define  std_std_iProduct 15               // Product name string index
00298 #define  std_iSerialNumber 16              // Serial number string index
00299 #define  std_bNumConfigurations 17         // Number of supported configurations
00300 
00301 // Configuration Descriptor Array Indicies
00302 #define  cfg_bLength 0                     // Length of this desc
00303 #define  cfg_bDescriptorType 1             // Config desc type (const. 0x02)
00304 #define  cfg_wTotalLength_lsb 2            // Total length, including
00305 #define  cfg_wTotalLength_msb 3            // interface & endpoints
00306 #define  cfg_bNumInterfaces 4              // Number of supported int's
00307 #define  cfg_bConfigurationValue 5         // Config index
00308 #define  cfg_iConfiguration 6              // Index for string desc
00309 #define  cfg_bmAttributes 7                // Power, wakeup options
00310 #define  cfg_MaxPower 8                    // Max bus power consumed
00311 
00312 // Interface Descriptor Array Indicies
00313 #define  if_bLength 0                      // Length of this desc
00314 #define  if_bDescriptorType 1              // Interface desc type (const. ??  )
00315 #define  if_bInterfaceNumber 2             // This interface index
00316 #define  if_bAlternateSetting 3            // Alternate index
00317 #define  if_bNumEndpoints 4                // Endpoints used by this interface
00318 #define  if_bInterfaceClass 5              // Device class
00319 #define  if_bInterfaceSubClass 6           // Device subclass
00320 #define  if_bInterfaceProcotol 7           // Class-specific protocol
00321 #define  if_iInterface 8                   // Index for string desc
00322 
00323 // Endpoint Descriptor Array Indicies
00324 #define  ep_bLength 0                      // Length of this desc
00325 #define  ep_bDescriptorType 1              // Endpoint desc type
00326 #define  ep_bEndpointAddress 2             // This endpoint address
00327 #define  ep_bmAttributes 3                 // Transfer type
00328 #define  ep_wMaxPacketSize 4               // Max FIFO size
00329 #define  ep_bInterval 6                    // Polling interval (int only)
00330 
00331 // Descriptor structure
00332 // This structure contains all usb descriptors for the device.
00333 // The descriptors are held in array format, and are accessed with the offsets
00334 // defined in the header file "usb.h". The constants used in the
00335 // array declarations are also defined in header file "usb.h".
00336 typedef struct DESCRIPTORS {
00337    BYTE bStdDevDsc[STD_DSC_SIZE];
00338    BYTE bCfg1[CFG_DSC_SIZE + IF_DSC_SIZE*CFG1_IF_DSC + EP_DSC_SIZE*CFG1_EP_DSC];
00339 } DESCRIPTORS;
00340 
00341 /*---- Standard requests -------------------------------------------*/
00342 
00343 // Standard Request Codes
00344 #define  GET_STATUS              0x00
00345 #define  CLEAR_FEATURE           0x01
00346 #define  SET_FEATURE             0x03
00347 #define  SET_ADDRESS             0x05
00348 #define  GET_DESCRIPTOR          0x06
00349 #define  SET_DESCRIPTOR          0x07
00350 #define  GET_CONFIGURATION       0x08
00351 #define  SET_CONFIGURATION       0x09
00352 #define  GET_INTERFACE           0x0A
00353 #define  SET_INTERFACE           0x0B
00354 #define  SYNCH_FRAME             0x0C
00355 
00356 // bmRequestType Masks
00357 #define  CMD_MASK_DIR            0x80     // Request direction bit mask
00358 #define  CMD_MASK_TYPE           0x60     // Request type bit mask
00359 #define  CMD_MASK_RECIP          0x1F     // Request recipient bit mask
00360 #define  CMD_MASK_COMMON         0xF0     // Common request mask
00361 
00362 // bmRequestType Direction Field
00363 #define  CMD_DIR_IN              0x80     // IN Request
00364 #define  CMD_DIR_OUT             0x00     // OUT Request
00365 
00366 // bmRequestType Type Field
00367 #define  CMD_TYPE_STD            0x00     // Standard Request
00368 #define  CMD_TYPE_CLASS          0x20     // Class Request
00369 #define  CMD_TYPE_VEND           0x40     // Vendor Request
00370 
00371 // bmRequestType Recipient Field
00372 #define  CMD_RECIP_DEV           0x00     // Device Request
00373 #define  CMD_RECIP_IF            0x01     // Interface Request
00374 #define  CMD_RECIP_EP            0x02     // Endpoint Request
00375 #define  CMD_RECIP_OTHER         0x03     // Other Request
00376 
00377 // bmRequestType Common Commands
00378 #define  CMD_STD_DEV_OUT         0x00     // Standard Device Request OUT
00379 #define  CMD_STD_DEV_IN          0x80     // Standard Device Request IN
00380 #define  CMD_STD_IF_OUT          0x01     // Standard Interface Request OUT
00381 #define  CMD_STD_IF_IN           0x81     // Standard Interface Request IN
00382 
00383 // Standard Descriptor Types
00384 #define  DSC_DEVICE              0x01     // Device Descriptor
00385 #define  DSC_CONFIG              0x02     // Configuration Descriptor
00386 #define  DSC_STRING              0x03     // String Descriptor
00387 #define  DSC_INTERFACE           0x04     // Interface Descriptor
00388 #define  DSC_ENDPOINT            0x05     // Endpoint Descriptor
00389 
00390 #define  DSC_MASK_REMOTE         0x20     // Remote Wakeup Support Mask
00391                                           // (bmAttributes Config Desc field)
00392 
00393 // Feature Selectors (used in set and clear feature commands)
00394 #define  DEVICE_REMOTE_WAKEUP    0x01     // Remote Wakeup selector
00395 #define  ENDPOINT_HALT           0x00     // Endpoint Halt selector
00396
